the applicable provisions of the Massach.raw_text: the applicable provisions of the Massachusetts General Laws governing custody and the Probate and Family Court.
the applicable provisions of the Massach.proposition: This Court has jurisdiction over the parties and the subject matter pursuant to the applicable provisions of the Massachusetts General Laws governing custody and the Probate and Family Court.

Massachusetts law and rules governing se.raw_text: Massachusetts law and rules governing service in family and probate matters.
Massachusetts law and rules governing se.proposition: Plaintiff will serve the Defendant with a copy of this Complaint and the Court’s summons in accordance with Massachusetts law and rules governing service in family and probate matters.

the Massachusetts Uniform Child Custody.raw_text: the Massachusetts Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act
the Massachusetts Uniform Child Custody.proposition: Plaintiff intends to rely upon applicable Massachusetts statutes and case law at hearing (including, but not limited to, the Massachusetts Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act, relevant chapters of the Massachusetts General Laws governing custody and the Probate and Family Court, and Massachusetts appellate decisions interpreting the standard for modification and the "best interests of the child" test).

relevant chapters of the Massachusetts G.raw_text: relevant chapters of the Massachusetts General Laws governing custody and the Probate and Family Court
relevant chapters of the Massachusetts G.proposition: Plaintiff intends to rely upon applicable Massachusetts statutes and case law at hearing (including, but not limited to, the Massachusetts Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act, relevant chapters of the Massachusetts General Laws governing custody and the Probate and Family Court, and Massachusetts appellate decisions interpreting the standard for modification and the "best interests of the child" test).
